Name: AuroraBound Deluxe
About the game: AuroraBound Deluxe is a relaxing and addictive puzzle game, where you link matching pieces together to discover beautiful hidden patterns. Includes a 'Custom Puzzle' mode that enables you to generate unique puzzles to suit your own preferences. It also has unlimited free hints to help you if you get stuck. Features: 1000s of unique puzzles to explore A beautiful and serene visual style Soothing, dynamic background music Gradual difficulty curve for a satisfying experience Hint system to help you out if you get stuck Custom puzzle generator to tailor puzzles to your preferences
